MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 area of Hawick, affecting properties in Newlands Farm and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:53pm due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Groundstone Heights and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:01pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
